entry.string: From this screen, you will be adding a release note for your extension. Please enter all applicable information. Release notes are held for validation. If your extension has never had a release before, it may take extra time to determine the certification status. For more information on the certification of extensions, and their benefits, please read this information (insert link).
entry.translation: Frum thees screee, yuoo veell be-a eddeeng a releese-a nute-a fur yuoor ixtenseeun. Bork bork bork! Pleese-a inter ell eppleeceble-a inffurmeshun. Releese-a nutes ere-a held fur feleedeshun. Iff yuoor ixtenseeun hes nefer hed a releese-a beffure-a, it mey teke-a ixtra teeme-a tu determeene-a zee certeefficeshun stetoos. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Fur mure-a inffurmeshun oon zee certeefficeshun ooff ixtenseeuns, und zeeur beneffeets, pleese-a reed thees inffurmeshun (insert leenk).
